mainHero.title: Mind Mate
mainHero.description: At MindMate, we believe that mental health is just as important as physical health. That's why we've created an app to help people take control of their well-being and improve their overall quality of life. With our comprehensive tools and resources, we hope to raise awareness about mental health and provide support for those who need it.

items.title: Track your emotional health
items.description: Mood tracking is a useful tool that can help you to better understand your emotional well-being. By regularly recording your mood, you can begin to identify patterns and triggers that may be impacting your emotional state. This can be especially helpful if you experience mood swings or fluctuations that you struggle to explain or manage.
Utilize our website to assist yourself by taking a simple assessment and obtaining information on potential treatments. You can also connect with professionals for further assistance.
items.title: You are not alone, there is support available

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
